caption: Berkshire and two of its big investments
trend_summary: This graph shows the rebased share price performance of Berkshire Hathaway, Bank of America, and Citigroup from 2023 to early 2025. Berkshire Hathaway consistently outperformed both banks, ending with a roughly 40% gain. Bank of America demonstrated moderate growth, ending around a 20% gain. Citigroup's stock was the most volatile and weakest performer, ending close to its initial rebased value after experiencing a significant dip in late 2023.
author: Eric Platt and Stephen Gandel
article_title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway slashes stakes in Bank of America and Citi
